title: Ricotta, mozzarella and black olive pizza
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon dried active yeast', '150ml warm water, divided', '1 teaspoon sugar', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '300g bread flour', '1 level tablespoon salt', '250g fresh ricotta cheese', '200g tomato passata', '250g mozzarella, cubed', '2 tablespoons pitted black olives']
